DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective randomized Study comparing Weight loss, Esophageal Motility and Reflux in lap. Gastric Bypass vs. lap. Banded-Gastric Bypass using the A.M.I. Soft Gastric Bypass Band (B-Band.
DOC.brief_title: Banded Versus Non-banded Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: BMI > 40 or BMI > 35 + hypertension/diabetes mellitus pH metry and manometry preoperatively formerly operations of the stomach formerly open abdominal surgery malignancy within the last 5 years formerly gastric banding
